title: The Collaring of Molly Jenkins
description: Russell Bennett believes every woman will submit to one man. That was until he met Molly Jenkins a sophisticated Mistress and trained Domme.Love they say conquers all, even a strong dominate like Molly, or had it?Would Molly ever wear his collar? Russellâ€™s theory was crumbling around him. Would he lose the love of a lifetime because of his need to be her Master?
author: Ethan Radcliff
